item.description:
CANCELLED!!! BLUE HILLS HAS NO POWER.

UPDATE 8:15AM: still planning to go, check back for time and and meeting place, this looks like heavy wet snow but should turn to powder.

Anyone want to head over to Blue Hills tomorrow afternoon? Of course this is dependent on the intensity of the storm, opening time at Blue Hills, if I get my car dug out. But what the heck - I am optimistic.

I have never snowboarded (or skied) Blue Hills but you could see it from my home town growing up. I have been waiting for a Boston centered powder day, this is it.

Blue Hills does not even open until 2pm but it is only $20 until 6pm. There may be some delay in opening due to the snow. I will check back in the morning, please include phone number because we may need to coordinate details. I will be driving from Somerville and can take 2, I highly suggest 4 wheel drive with decent snow clearance.

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Blue Hills Wednesday afternoon
